div.label: Search

button.class: button js-form-submit form-submit btn-default btn icon-only

li.a: Open Swim, Gym and Indoor Walking

p.strong: BHM Schools will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year as directed by Governor Walz. Distance learning is in effect for BHM students through June 4. During this time, staff could be working remotely, and we recommend that you communicate with them through email.

div.p: BHM Schools unites the communities of Buffalo, Hanover, Montrose and surrounding townships.
